Properties.name: Istanbul
Properties.description: Istanbul,a city where East meets West and blending rich history.

TravelPack1.activities: Dolmabahce Palace, Topkapi Palace, Sultanahmet Mosque
TravelPack1.name: Cultural
TravelPack1.description: Explore Istanbul's iconic landmarks: Dolmabahce Palace, Topkapi Palace, and Sultanahmet Mosque, each rich in history and architectural splendor.

TravelPack2.activities: Bosphorus Tour and Grand Bazaar Tour
TravelPack2.name: Tour
TravelPack2.description: Experience Istanbul's highlights: Bosphorus Tour offers scenic views, while Grand Bazaar Tour immerses you in vibrant markets.

TravelPack3.activities: Fish Sandwich and Turkish Delight Tasting
TravelPack3.name: Food
TravelPack3.description: Experience the savory delight of Fish Sandwich and the sweet indulgence of Turkish Delight, a culinary journey through Istanbul's flavors.

TravelPack4.name: Sport
TravelPack4.description: Watch an important football match between two big football clubs and an exciting basketball match between two big basketball clubs.
TravelPack4.locations: Kadikoy Sukru Saracoglu Stadium and Atasehir Ulker Arena

Properties.name: Berlin
Properties.description: Berlin, a city of contrasts, blending rich history and cultural scene.

TravelPack1.activities: Museum Tour and Historic District Walk
TravelPack1.name: Cultural
TravelPack1.description: Uncover the city's rich heritage: Museum Tour offers insights into artifacts, while Historic District Walk immerses you in the stories of its past.

TravelPack2.name: Historical
TravelPack2.description: Explore Berlin's vibrant history with our tour, including iconic landmarks like Berlin Wall at Checkpoint Charlie and uncovering tales of resilience and transformation.

TravelPack3.activities: Berlin Cathedral and Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church
TravelPack3.name: Religion
TravelPack3.description: Marvel at Berlin's religious landmarks: Berlin Cathedral boasts architectural grandeur, while Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church exudes historical significance.

TravelPack4.name: Sport
TravelPack4.description: Experience the excitement of Bayer Leverkusen's thrilling championship match in Leverkusen and Witness the electrifying EuroLeague Final at the iconic Mercedes Benz Arena in Berlin.

Properties.name: Tokyo
Properties.description: Tokyo,where tradition and innovation intertwine,shaping a dynamic cityscape.

TravelPack1.activities: Tokyo Imperial Palace and Shrine Meiji
TravelPack1.name: Cultural
TravelPack1.description: Experience Tokyo's cultural treasures: Tokyo Imperial Palace reflects grandeur, while Meiji Shrine offers tranquility amidst urbanity.

TravelPack2.activities: Museum Tour and Historic District Walk
TravelPack2.name: Historical
TravelPack2.description: Explore the city's heritage: Museum Tour delves into artifacts, while Historic District Walk unveils its rich past.

TravelPack3.name: Car
TravelPack3.description: Feel the thrill: Tokyo Drift offers high-speed excitement, while Go-Karting lets you race through the vibrant streets.

TravelPack4.name: Food
TravelPack4.description: Delve into Japanese cuisine: Sushi tantalizes with its fresh flavors and delicate craftsmanship, while Ramen offers a comforting and flavorful experience, showcasing the diverse culinary landscape of Japan.
